Klarna makes shopping smoooth And we do it with flair because shopping is fun Every day, we help customers, businesses, and partners explore just how smoooth the modern shopping experience can be, , It means were constantly changing the game Always trying out new things And we encourage our people to do the same To grow To develop Because we dont believe roles have to stay fixed Instead we inspire our people to take an irregular career path As a company of 350 dynamic startups, our whole business is built for it So once youre in, theres no telling what will happen next, , Would you like to work with some of the biggest brands in the world Klarnas payment options are available at retail clients including HM, ASOS, Adidas, Apple, Disney, Ticketmaster and many more Klarna is looking for a strong marketer with consumer, payments andor retail experience to help our retailers market and message Klarna to the mutual benefit of both parties, , Successful candidates will possess the ability to combine creativity and business acumen in order to elevate Klarnas brand equity across all relevant channels in partnership with our biggest clients The role requires a deep understanding of the Klarna brand, our payment options and shoppers in order to develop the right marketing messages and campaigns to accelerate Klarna use at the retail checkout The successful candidate will work closely with other Klarna comarketing and commercial team members globally, , , , , , , , Please include a CV in english, , , , Klarna was founded in Stockholm, Sweden in 2005 Since then, weve changed the banking industry forever And now were creating the worlds smooothest shopping experience We serve 80 million consumers worldwide, and partner with 190,000 merchants  with a new merchant joining us every 8 minutes Including some of the worlds leading brands, such as HM, ASOS, IKEA, Adidas, Samsung and Lufthansa Our offices are spread over 18 different markets, hosted by 3000 people from 90 nationalities

At Uber, we ignite opportunity by setting the world in motion We take on big problems to help drivers, riders, delivery partners, and eaters get moving in more than 10,000 cities around the world, , We welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move independently If you have the curiosity, passion, and collaborative spirit, work with us, and lets move the world forward, together, , , , As part of the EMEA Regional Performance Marketing team, you will be responsible for the MiddleEast and Africas performance crafting the global strategy to the local needs Youll be the main POC within the region for Marketing and Operations teams and work hand in hand with them to identify the local challenges and opportunities to craft the best Performance Marketing response Owning specific regional marketing projects, leading endtoend strategy, coordinating the execution, and working closely with the analytics team to provide measurement and reporting

filled with the best fresh ingredients, , With our meal boxes with easy to cook recipes and fresh ingredients, we are driving change in the quickly evolving food industry From developing our recipes and for us, learning never stops We make quick but informed decisions and as a fastgrowing company, we value flexibility and speed, , , , We are looking for a strong Brand  Marketing Communications expert with a proven track record in digital Marketing  Communications You will be managing an international team with campaign managers, designers, content specialists, and community managers, a team of about fifteen young professionals You are responsible for continuing building brand saliency and visibility in our countries which we manage out of our office in Amsterdam The Netherlands, Belgium, and Luxembourg We are looking for an expert that can drive our strategic brand plans, has a handson approach, and possesses the ability to lead an international team You will report directly to our CMO for the Benelux, , , , , , , , , , The unique opportunity to have a serious impact on a growing and listed company A lot of learning and development opportunities within a young and dynamic ecommerce company Freedom of idea and initiative, execution, and implementation of your own ideas and initiatives You can make use of the company benefits, like food and fruit in the office, sports classes, such as yoga, boot camp, and boxing class An amazing team and office in Amsterdam, check it out here Next, to that, you also get a discount on the HelloFresh Box And of course, youll earn a competitive salary, , , , We take a look at your resume and cover letter If we see a match, we will invite you for a video call to get to know each other Are we still positive We will schedule a Job Title: Brand Manager Assistant (Milka, Lu, Oreo, …) – 6 months Internship – Oosterhout (The Netherlands) – January 2021
Job Description: Job Description, , Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelez International, , Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking Make It Matter, , As an organisation we are committed to developing the next generation of Makers and Bakers Joining us at an early career stage in our fast paced and ever changing environment will enable you to do more, learn more and grow more You will be encouraged to step outside your comfort zone you may even surprise yourself We will ensure you are given the support you need to be at your best and enable you to be yourself and bring passion and personality Here you can lean in and speak up and bring your own flavour, , , , , , , , , , , , , , Our early careers offer a variety of challenging developmental experiences You can expect a combination of stimulating projects, exposure to industry experts, onthejob learning alongside experienced professionals, continuous development opportunities and much more, , It is also a chance to  A high majority of our junior opportunities are filled by our previous interns, , , , , , , , The responsibilities of this position are performed within the framework of a regional business model that is defined and managed by Mondelz Europe GmbH, Switzerland , , Mondelz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law, Intern Fixed TermInternsEarly Careers

About The Job, , As a Research leader, you define and drive the understanding of customers  and the future of travel experiences You partner with our teams to understand guests and partners Your team identifies and shapes product strategy and inspires their crossfunctional partners to create great experiences Leading and growing a high performing team of skilled researchers who provide the foundation for wellinformed, objective, dataoriented decision making across Bookingcom accommodation business, , In this role, you will guide research processes, manage and mentor your team and partner with multidisciplinary product teams to identify customer needs and develop insights for product development, , You will build fundamental understanding of the current user experience, pull together customer data collected by teams across the business, develop an accurate and inspiring picture of our customers to guide ongoing product development and shape early product definition and strategy, , You are a strong and empathetic leader who manages and develops the members of the team You bring expertise in research practices across all phases of the product lifecycle, excellent knowledge of primary research methods surveys, diary studies, interviews and focus groups as well as secondary  expert methods such as litreviews, cognitive walkthroughs and desk research, grounding in product development processes and effective crossfunctional collaboration skills You will define and lead research programs that influence the customer proposition, align UX research activities with wider plans and build user centred practices in product teams You are a strong and empathetic leader who manages and develops the members of the team You are an excellent communicator and will partner closely with senior stakeholders and the leadership team

Mendix is on a mission to enable anyone in any organization  from the marketing coordinator to the software developer to the CEO  to create things that are transformational for their company We are fundamentally reinventing the way applications are created and were reinventing the future of software development Sounds ambitious, right We agree, , Not to brag, but nearly 4,000 organizations worldwide, including KLM, Medtronic, Merck, and Philips, rely on Mendix to build web and mobile applications Thousands of our customers use our platform to delight their clients and empower their employees Its no surprise that were a recognized Leader by Gartner and Forrester in a redhot market expected to exceed 21 billion by 2022 Ok, maybe we did want to brag a little But were proud of what weve accomplishedandwere humble enough to admit that we need you to make us even more effective, , At Mendix, the marketing team has been growing rapidly for the past few years Now we need to add more digital marketers who can help the rest of the team translate and deploy their respective campaigns within our entire digital marketing ecosystem, , As an Integrated Digital Marketing Manager, youll be responsible for working with both our regional marketing teams and crossfunctional work teams to create and execute integrated digital marketing plans tied to those teams campaigns The successful candidate will have a broad and varied background with handson experience across many B2Bfocused digital marketing channels and tools, , , , , , If you have direct experience in any of these specific platforms, please highlight that experience in your cover letterresume, as this will give you a leg up, , Our Guiding Principles, , While we live on different continents, speak different languages, and work on different things, we are bound by our MendixBlue guiding principles Being MendixBlue means that you live the culture, and you consistently improve it as we grow Its kind of a big deal, , We put the customer first  Without our customers, we have no business So, if you act in the best interest of our customers, alwaysyou belong here, , We think big  We work to have a meaningful, lasting impact on the world So, if you aim high and think long termyou belong here, , We innovate  We want to be what happens next So, if you ask what if and work to find a way or make oneyou belong here, , We nurture talent  We look, not just at the sum of what an individual has done, but at the potential of who they can be So, if youre up for learning from your failuresyou belong here, , We hear every voice  Inflated egos dont last here, humility does So, if you share credit and ensure that the best ideas win  regardless of who they come fromyou belong here, , We own it  If something needs doing, we do it So, if you focus on the outcome, and take initiative to get it doneyou belong here, , We have fun  We use laughter as a common language We can ask for help and were happy to give it So, if you find joy and purpose in what you doyou belong here, , Make your career at Mendix, , There are precious few jobs that let you create the future But youll find one at Mendix We are at a pivotal time in our companys existence where rapid growth meets stable funding This is the time for industrious people to raise their hands to solve the next generation of problems Mendix is a place where ambitious people can thrive where you can identify an issue, propose a solution, and build the structure to make it happen, , Important to know Mendix is a Siemens business, which means were backed by the resources and stability of one of the worlds largest and most forwardlooking enterprises Think job security, , Since our company was founded in 2005, our aim has been to create a great work environment for people at all stages in their careers Thats why we are so pleased and honored that we were rated a top Cloud Computing Company to work for in 2019, based on feedback from our employees on Glassdoor With offices in the Netherlands, the UK, Germany, and the US, and more coming, we provide an international playground to truly impact the world through lowcode, , Digital Industries, , Mendix Technology BV, , Experienced Professional, , Fulltime

Job Title: Senior Field Marketing Manager, (NW & Central EMEA)
Job Description: Description, , Informatica is currently looking for a Senior Field Marketing Manager, with experience in a B2B role in the Enterprise Software industry, to join our EMEA Field Marketing team Based in Amsterdam, Netherlands your role will have a strong focus on the Benelux plus Nordics  DACH market, , , , As an experienced Senior Field Marketing Manager, you are responsible for building and executing an integrated field marketing plan that meets the agreed marketing contribution targets You will work closely together with your field marketing team members and with a variety of important stakeholders eg Regional Sales Directors, Global Marketing teams, etc, , In a fastpaced, everchanging, and rapidly growing market, you will know how to develop and execute successful marketing initiatives and campaigns to build awareness, create demand, drive and nurture leads, and accelerate opportunities to close, , , , , , , , , , , , Informatica empowers the worlds most progressive companies to realize datadriven digital transformations that are changing the world To do this, we live by our We DATA values We Do Good, Act As One Team, Think Customer First, and Aspire For The Future Together, we are conquering the impossible with data and changing what was once unimaginable into whats now commonmaking lives richer, businesses stronger, and our world better, , , , A career with Informatica gives you all the opportunities and benefits that can only come from working for the trusted industry leader By joining our team, youll be able to solve reallife problems, make a difference, have a global impact, and join a supportive group of globally diverse teammates We encourage you to be yourself, grow with us and unleash your potential

Global Service Product Marketing Director, MSD Service Innovation  Marketing, , How will this role make an impact, , The primary purpose of this role is two fold Firstly to ensure that the overall service strategy for MSDs Business Units BUs is accurately reflected in the marketing developed and deployed for new service products and gotomarket strategies and that it delivers on the targeted marketing revenue and BU growth objectives for this business Secondly it is to stay at the forefront of service and solutions thinking, consistently driving the organisations strategic approach towards a digital service and solutions value proposition for our customers The goal of MSD service is to become a world class service organization leveraging innovation and digital, to drive customer business outcomes solutions and deliver financials performance The role of the Global Service Product Marketing Director is to lead the expansion of digitalvalue added services in alignment with the Business Units BUs strategy, , The leads a team of service marketing professionals covering vertical marketing and product marketing and business development, Reporting to the SD Service Innovation  Marketing this position is responsible for generating marketing driven revenue, improving and developing and delivering on the strategic service marketing plans

Mission, Customers store petabytes of data in the Databricks Unified Analytics Platform, enabling an unprecedented ability to analyze both realtime and historical data As the product manager for the Connectivity team in Amsterdam, you will build features that let analysts connect to Databricks from their favorite BI tool such as Tableau or PowerBI Additionally, you will identify and remove performance bottlenecks, working with a number of teams across Databricks on network protocol and service scalability, Your work will help tens of thousands of analysts analyze their business, explore trends and share insights Bring the simplicity and power of Databricks groundbreaking Unified Analytics Platform to the world and help companies solve the worlds toughest problems with data, , , , , , Databricks mission is to accelerate innovation for its customers by unifying Data Science, Engineering and Business Founded by the original creators of Apache Spark, Databricks provides a Unified Analytics Platform for data science teams to collaborate with data engineering and lines of business to build data products Users achieve faster timetovalue with Databricks by creating analytic workflows that go from ETL and interactive exploration to production The company also makes it easier for its users to focus on their data by providing a fully managed, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure that reduces operational complexity and total cost of ownership Databricks, venturebacked by Andreessen Horowitz, NEA and Battery Ventures, among others, has a global customer base that includes Viacom, Shell, and HP For more information, visit wwwdatabrickscom, Apache, Apache Spark and Spark are trademarks of the Apache Software Foundation

across the business, working with your team to question so what and be excited for what next  Youll be driving a team at the heart of a datadriven marketing revolution Youre excited to join us for that transformation and be the engine behind it in Netherlandsnot just when the hard work is done, , , , , , , , , , , , , , Youll have to enjoy working in a fastpaced environment and it will take and build your own career, , At Upfield we want you to bring your ideas, your motivation and desire to succeed This part of the role is up to you to complete, , , , We are the largest plantbased company in the world, and we believe in doing whats right for our people, our customers and the planet, , We are a highly entrepreneurial fastpaced team running a multibillion Euro business across Mendix is on a mission to enable anyone in any organization  from the marketing coordinator to the software developer to the CEO  to create things that are transformational for their company We are fundamentally reinventing the way applications are created and were reinventing the future of software development Sounds ambitious, right We agree, , Not to brag, but nearly 4,000 organizations worldwide, including KLM, Medtronic, Merck, and Philips, rely on Mendix to build web and mobile applications Thousands of our customers use our platform to delight their clients and empower their employees Its no surprise that were a recognized Leader by Gartner and Forrester in a redhot market expected to exceed 21 billion by 2022 Ok, maybe we did want to brag a little But were proud of what weve accomplishedandwere humble enough to admit that we need you to make us even more effective, , , , , , Mendix is seeking an SAP Campaign Manager to join the Corporate Marketing Team In this role, you will develop the global marketing campaign plan to jointly, under the SAP Solutions Extension partner program, build pipeline and acquire customers for SAPs offering, SAP Cloud Platform Rapid Application Development by Mendix Working with the SAP Solutions Marketing Strategist and dedicated SAP sales team within Mendix, as the SAP Campaign Manager you will be responsible for the full campaign lifecycle, from development, goal setting, execution, measurement and follow up from the programs, , The ideal candidate has proven experience working with SAP preferably as a SolEx partner in the field of Business Technology Platform or Application Delivery The successful candidate has a demonstrated ability to collaborate with internal sales teams and contacts at SAP to ensure joint gotomarket plans align to business objectives under the partnership, , , , , , , , While we live on different continents, speak different languages, and work on different things, we are bound by our MendixBlue guiding principles Being MendixBlue means that you live the culture, and you consistently improve it as we grow Its kind of a big deal, ,  Without our customers, we have no business So, if you act in the best interest of our customers, alwaysyou belong here, ,  We work to have a meaningful, lasting impact on the world So, if you aim high and think long termyou belong here, ,  We want to be what happens next So, if you ask what if and work to find a way or make oneyou belong here, ,  We look, not just at the sum of what an individual has done, but at the potential of who they can be So, if youre up for learning from your failuresyou belong here, ,  Inflated egos dont last here, humility does So, if you share credit and ensure that the best ideas win  regardless of who they come fromyou belong here, ,  If something needs doing, we do it So, if you focus on the outcome, and take initiative to get it doneyou belong here, ,  We use laughter as a common language We can ask for help and were happy to give it So, if you find joy and purpose in what you doyou belong here, , , , There are precious few jobs that let you create the future But youll find one at Mendix We are at a pivotal time in our companys existence where rapid growth meets stable funding This is the time for industrious people to raise their hands to solve the next generation of problems Mendix is a place where ambitious people can thrive where you can identify an issue, propose a solution, and build the structure to make it happen, , Mendix is a Siemens business, which means were backed by the resources and stability of one of the worlds largest and most forwardlooking enterprises Think job security, , Since our company was founded in 2005, our aim has been to create a great work environment for people at all stages in their careers Thats why we are so pleased and honored that we were rated a top Cloud Computing Company to work for in 2019, based on feedback from our employees on Glassdoor With offices in the Netherlands, the UK, Germany, and the US, and more coming, we provide an international playground to truly impact the world through lowcode

customers, , , , Empower Life Everyday, , At Sanofi we work across human health from vaccines to rare diseases, and consumer healthcare This creates opportunities to work across different areas to build a diverse and exciting career Sanofi has the capabilities and resources to support your aspirations to fulfill your ambitions and be the best you can be, , Our purpose at Sanofi is to work passionately every day to understand and solve healthcare needs of people across the world Our ambition is by 2025, to be a top 3 innovative, global and diversified human healthcare company One that embraces transformative technologies and is focused on its area of excellence, which means were not there to try to solve everybodys problems We want to focus on those areas where we know we are making a difference, , The values we live by are teamwork, courage, respect and integrity, , At Sanofi diversity and inclusion is foundational to how we operate and embedded in our Core Values We recognize to truly tap into the richness diversity brings we must lead with inclusion and have a workplace where those differences can thrive and be leveraged to empower the lives of our colleagues, patients and customers We respect and celebrate the diversity of our people, their backgrounds and experiences and provide equal opportunity for all

Job Title: Account Manager - North of the Netherlands
Job Description: At Signify, our culture of continuous education is transforming our industry Our people can acquire new skills and perspectives through customized online content and onthejob experiences Through our leadership in connected lighting and the Internet of Things, were helping people including our employees  to be more comfortable, productive and live smarter, safer lives, , And were committed to operating sustainably Our entire operations are carbon neutral and were now focused on doubling our positive impact doubling the pace of the Paris Agreement doubling our circular revenues doubling revenues from innovations which benefit society and doubling our percentage of women in leadership, , We value diversity in all its forms and believe that our differences make us greater together Working for Signify means being creative and adaptive while working in high pace and maintaining quality If that sounds like something youd like to be part of, wed love to hear from you, , Youll join our Benelux Public Sales team as an based in the North of the Netherlands, , As an Account Manager in our Public segment you have the exciting opportunity to work together with municipalities and provincesto help them create the smart city for the future through valueadd connected street  road lighting solutions, data intelligence and generating a more energy efficient, safer and responsive environment You will be in a position of transforming the light equipment of our public customers from conventional lighting to connected and smart LED lighting systems and managed services, which brings added value far beyond lighting, , You are going to work in a team with the Segment and Product Marketing, Sales Back Office, Supply Chain and our Lighting Designteam Here you will work with the best and brightest in your area, providing an opportunity for each person to maximize their potential, directly contribute to our organizations success and be appreciated for their differences In fact, our culture is built on a foundation for valuing our employees as the key asset, , , , , httpswwwyoutubecomwatchvT0ewypZ5nyslistPLj9hU1O4UB00pjCsPYKv5TXJVQvcHhKGBindex14, , , , , , , , , , , Were offering multiple opportunities for career development, like mentoring, coaching and stretch assignments, with strong international exposure for dynamic profiles Learning is fundamental to our culture Through continuous learning, we are transforming the industry You have the chance to learn every day, acquire new skills and perspectives through customized online programs, and onthejob experiences, , See SignifyLife through the eyes of our employees

We have a great opportunity to join the European Measurement Solutions Sales team as a European Sales Manager for the oil  gas industry As we increase our focus on accounts and industries to better serve our customers with a greater understanding of their process and needs, the European Sales Manager OG will lead the sales channel to deliver outstanding products and solutions to customers, , , The Measurement Solutions Sales Manager for Oil and Gas is responsible for delivering the bookings and sales targets for the industry vertical and crafting a longterm growth strategy to strengthen Emersons position in the industry across all MSOL product lines They will work closely with Product Management, Marketing and industry subject matter authorities to and act as a single point of contact for the business unit to drive industry growth programs through the sales organization, , , If you are keen leader and sales professional, ready to take on this challenge, we welcome you to join our team, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , You are passionate about making an impact and always act with integrity You continuously push yourself to achieve new goals and are not afraid to question the status quo by proposing creative solutions to problems , , , , , , By joining Emerson as a Sales Manager, you will be working at the heart of our business This means that the skills and business insight gained can serve as an invaluable foundation toward developing your career within our global organization We offer plentiful opportunities for advancement and support this through our formal personal development planning process, , , Our onboarding program uses a blended learning approach to get you up and running as quickly as possible You benefit from Emerson certified trainers with extensive knowledge of our customers, products and applications, , , Our global Women in Stem initiative gives you the opportunity to connect with local peers that share the same interest, to promote the diversity  inclusion and early STEM education and to benefit from professional development to access leadership opportunities Also, we are committed to maintaining a partnership with the Society of Women Engineers SWE, , , Our inclusive company culture celebrates the unique perspectives, diversity of thoughts, and outstanding innovation that come to life when we actively seek to hire and develop the best, brightest team members from all backgrounds These unique points of view help cultivate fresh thinking and new ideas, ensuring our continued success into the future, , , , , , Inside Channel Sales Manager, , Are you a seasoned sales professional A proactive seller, who excels in a fastpaced and dynamic growth environment Are you ready to showcase your background by leading our Channel Partners in the development and execution of rapid growth sales initiatives, , We are looking for an to join our EMEA Partner Support Center You will be responsible for the development, enablement and joint Demand and Pipeline generation initiatives for a set of Nutanix named partners, , You will be joining a unique team People who succeed at Nutanix have a sense of urgency, a lot of initiative, a commitment to customer success, and enthusiasm about pushing the edge as well as a sense of humor We provide interesting work, a great product, new things to learn, and the freedom to make the job work the way you like it, , Together we will create a worldclass Channel and do extraordinary things So if you are ready to do your best work, come and join us, , , , Nutanix EMEA Inside Sales team is responsible for accelerating revenue growth This team is exposed to supporting functions like sales, marketing, channel and support within the organization as well as Nutanix customers, partners, distributors and alliances This team of 100 individuals is spread over the different hubs in EMEA, and consist of Sales Development Representatives, Inside Account Executives and Inside Channel Sales Managers The teams unique vibe comes from the constant creativity, innovation and focus on how we can better serve our customers every time The EMEA Inside Sales team is a talent pool for other functions in the company, it is the ideal opportunity to get to know the Nutanix portfolio and accelerate your career, , , , , , , Does this sound like you Lets talk, , , , Founded in 2009 and headquartered in San Jose, California, Nutanix is a passionate team of 6000 employees worldwide Our people we call ourselves Nutants are the heartbeat of LifeAtNutanix and one of the many things that makes Nutanix a great place to work at We share an intellectual curiosity, a bias for action, and an obsession for our customers We are builders and problem solvers with an entrepreneurial spirit Above all, we celebrate what makes each of us unique, , We are humbled to be recognized as one of Bloombergs Top 50 Companies to Watch in 2020 and one of the Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work For 2020 , , Were growing fast and disrupting the computing industry Join us and make your mark, , , , Nutanix is a global leader in cloud software and a pioneer in hyperconverged infrastructure solutions, making computing invisible anywhere Companies around the world use Nutanix software to leverage a single platform to manage any app, at any location, at any scale for their private, hybrid and multicloud environments, , , , Nutanix is an Equal Employment Opportunity and in the US an Affirmative Action employer Qualified applicants are considered for employment opportunities without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, disability status or any other category protected by applicable law We hire and promote individuals solely on the basis of qualifications for the job to be filled, , We strive to foster an inclusive working environment that enables all our Nutants to be themselves and to do great work in a safe and welcoming environment, free of unlawful discrimination, intimidation or harassment, , As part of this commitment, we will ensure that persons with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodations If you need a reasonable accommodation, please let us know by contacting hrnutanixcom

Job Title: Marketing Product Specialist Equipment - Zoetermeer, Netherlands
Job Description: Dentsply Sirona is the worlds largest manufacturer of professional dental products and technologies, with a 130year history of innovation and service to the dental industry and patients worldwide Dentsply Sirona develops, manufactures, and markets a comprehensive solutions offering including dental and oral health products as well as other consumable medical devices under a strong portfolio of world class brands Dentsply Sironas products provide innovative, highquality and effective solutions to advance patient care and deliver better and safer dentistry Dentsply Sironas global headquarters is located in Charlotte, North Carolina, USA The companys shares are listed in the United States on NASDAQ under the symbol XRAY, , , , As advanced as dentistry is today, we are dedicated to making it even better Our people have a passion for innovation and are committed to applying it to improve dental care We live and breathe high performance, working as one global team, bringing out the best in each other for the benefit of dental patients, and the professionals who serve them If you want to grow and develop as a part of a team that is shaping an industry, then were looking for the best to join us, , , ,  with our commitment to the best professional development, ,  as part of a highperformance, empowering culture, ,  with a market leader that continues to drive innovation, , by helping improve oral health worldwide, , Ter vervanging zoeken wij per direct voor ons Equipmentassortiment een, , , , In een enthousiast team van 6 collega marketing product specialisten ben je verantwoordelijk voor de lokale marketingstrategie van ons equipment portfolio Je vertaalt de plannen vanuit ons hoofdkantoor in een gerichte aanpak voor de BeNeLux markt Hierbij zijn jouw analyses en creatieve ideen van belang Je maakt marketingplannen en voert deze uit Je cordineert en initieert productintroducties, marketingacties, communicatiecampagnes Je werkt intensief samen met salescollegas, onze dealerpartners en collegas in internationale teams, , , , , Dentsply Sirona is an Equal Opportunity Affirmative Action employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, disability, or protected Veteran status We appreciate your interest in Dentsply Sirona, , If you need assistance with completing the online application due to a disability, please send an accommodation request to

Job Description, , How would you feel about developing and establishing felyx as an even stronger brand in the Benelux, , As urbanization is rising and the air quality is deteriorating, we feel the need to make our cities greener and healthier by offering a sustainable mobility solution Besides, we offer a new and fun way around town At felyx, everybody within their own expertise is contributing to a cleaner city by making this swift doortodoor transportation the new status quo We are working together as an ambitious team of entrepreneurs, operators, marketers and engineers, and looking to grow as we scale the business throughout Europe Felyx is one of the few micromobility players in the world that is EBITDA positive on group level with a fleet of c3,000 emopeds We are a young company with more than a hundred employees, working in the operations and at the head office in Amsterdam You can describe us as passionate, ambitious, entrepreneurial, and transparent Do you share our DNA Great Join our ride, , Heres the challenge, , Felyx is currently at a crucial stage of international growth Youll be the one to define and implement our brand strategy for the current and new cities within the Benelux Together with your internal and external stakeholders you will manage the planning and production of content and campaigns to convey our message and drive felyx success to even greater heights This is your chance to take full responsibility of felyxs marketing strategy in the Benelux, , What youll be doing, , , We truly get excited if you, , , Bonus points if you, , , We are very proud of the fact that we have been named by Linkedin as a top startup to work at for the second time in a row, together with many other prestigious awards weve received since our start in 2017 We are operational in the cities of Amsterdam, Rotterdam, The Hague, Delft, Groningen, Eindhoven and Brussels and will be launching 10 more Dutch cities in 2020 and 2021 Next to that, we have a strong focus on scaling up internationally

As our Junior Marketing  German speaking territories you will be part of our international DACH team that helps expand our successful online coupon platform and grow the Saleduck brand in Austria on, , You will contribute to big results with your great communication skills, and personal interests for online marketing, With the help of our experienced Country Manager and marketing, content, technical and account management team, we will give you access to marketing tools, insights and training to give you the skills to get the most out of your internship, , , , , , You are currently a registered student either Bachelor or Master Degree in Marketing, Economics or Business, You speak and write native German, You are fluent or near to fluent in English, , , , You have knowledge of local shopping habits and markets, , , , Training and guidance, Explanation of online marketing tools and programs, Free Friday drinks Fun International startup environment, Free bootcamp training weekly, Free lunch, , The position is available for 6 months

Mambu is the leading SaaS core banking engine If youre a customer of the largest digital bank in the EU, then youve probably interacted with our platform and didnt even know it We are at the heart of what makes digital banks and lenders work  the system that processes banking transactions and updates accounts and other financial records from deposits to loans and credit balances But we are different We are not just cloudnative, lean and flexible  we are helping to revolutionise financial services globally We are in a growth phase and weve only just begun, , To help us on our mission, we bring together people with the best skills and attitude It doesnt matter where you are from, what matters is the impact you have and your passion to make a difference, , We are looking for a passionate, skilled and enthusiastic to join our team and serve as the product leader to evangelize product strategy and drive thought leadership throughout the core banking product organisation Responsible for developing and executing on the strategic vision and product roadmap, as well as coaching, growing, and developing a diverse team of thoughtful Product Managers, , , , , , , , , , , , , To stay on top of the latest FinTech trends and our success stories, please follow us on LinkedIn, , For more details regarding our global career opportunities, please visit Career Site

Within Medical we are searching for a Sales Associate to support sales organisation in the Benelux The goal of this exciting position is to develop and execute marketing plans, including marketing programs, operations, collateral, data analysis, and marketing projects, , You will be developing a deep understanding of our Medical solutions and the Medical Market in the Benelux countries If you dont have the Medical knowledge yet, dont worry, you bring you drive, energy and talent, we will teach you on our portfolio, , This position report to the Medical Business Unit Director for Benelux and Nordic The role includes some travel, but your desk will be located at Stryker in Amsterdam You are fluent in both Dutch and English on a business level and you bring a commercial experience and drive, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Work From Home OccasionalTravel Percentage 10

Job Title: Senior Strategic Solution Sales, Jira Align
Job Description: Atlassian is continuing to hire with all interviewing and onboarding done virtually due to COVID19 All new and existing Atlassians will continue to work from home until its safe to return to our offices When our offices reopen, every Atlassian will have the choice to work from an office or from home, , At Atlassian, we are on a mission to help our customers compete and win in the modern, digital economy We have built a billiondollar, fastgrowing software business with over 150,000 paying customers, hundreds of sales and implementation partners and millions of users around the globe Our culture is open, welcoming, collaborative and passionately focused on our customers success, , This nontraditional Field Sales role is based in the Netherlands Our Strategic Solution Sales team builds and implements an effective sales strategy They drive adoption of select products and services to our largest customers At the same time, we want you to be a champion for our customers, providing feedback to our product and engineering teams and helping us optimize our customer experience You will lead a territory comprised of named accounts and a geographic region, frequently working arminarm with partners Youll do all of this in tight coordination with our Channel Partners, Product Specialists, and Marketing organization, , There is simply not a more exciting and hugely impactful strategic selling opportunity anywhere Is this the opportunity for you, , , , , , , , , , , , Whether you work in an office or a distributed team, Atlassian is highly collaborative and yes, fun To support you at work and play we offer some fantastic perks ample time off to relax and recharge, flexible working options, five paid volunteer days a year for your favourite cause, an annual allowance to support your learning  growth, unique ShipIt days, a company paid trip after five years and lots more, , , , Creating software that empowers everyone from small startups to the whos who of tech is why were here We build tools like Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, and Trello to help teams across the world become more nimble, creative, and alignedcollaboration is the heart of every product we dream of at Atlassian From Amsterdam and Austin, to Sydney and San Francisco, were looking for people who want to write the future and who believe that we can accomplish so much more together than apart At Atlassian, were committed to an environment where everyone has the autonomy and freedom to thrive, as well as the support of likeminded colleagues who are motivated by a common goal to Unleash the potential of every team , , , , We believe that the unique contributions of all Atlassians is the driver of our success To make sure that our products and culture continue to incorporate everyones perspectives and experience we never discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, or marital, veteran, or disability status, , All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines, , Learn more about Atlassians culture, interviewing flow, and hiring process by checking out our Candidate Resource Hub

Who We Are, Brooks is a team of passionate people united by a desire to do meaningful work, lead healthy lives and make a difference We share a focused mission to inspire everyone to run and be active Thats it No distractionsits all about the run

Job Title: Growth marketing & SEO Internship - German speaker
Job Description: Growth marketing  SEO Internship  German speaker, , Do you want the freedom to build something new and exciting with a talented team If you have a passion for technology, expertise in your native language, love to write, and are enthusiastic to learn more about content marketing  then lets get introduced

Content Marketing Manager, As our Content Marketing Manager, you will play an important role in telling our story and you will have an opportunity to set the content strategy throughout the organisation, , Fulltime

The Content Lead in Bookingcoms Content Agency works together with Product Managers and high level stakeholders in our Business Units to define the content strategy that supports their track to achieve its goals, , The Content Lead is responsible for creating a successful customer experience through their editorial content expertise for their assigned business unit or track, in close collaboration with UX teams and our internal Content Agency teams, , They are responsible for safeguarding our brand standards and content quality in their assigned business area They also ensure ongoing visibility on the success of the content to set the path for scaling it This role is creative and pragmatic in approach and has a strong knowledge of applying content design to building and launching a successful product The Content Lead is able to explain the why behind the proposed content plans to stakeholders and address the pros and cons of these against alternative solutions, using business impact and improved customer experience as measures for success, , A successful Content Lead has a highly collaborative nature, a passion for the latest developments in content and the desire to make a large commercial impact through content on one of the worlds leading travel platforms

As Digital Marketing Specialist you are supporting our inbound marketing efforts You help drive our demand generation campaigns and continuously run experiments to maximize lead generation and customer engagement, Banking is changing rapidly With Big Tech and Neobanks taking customer expectations to new heights, the industry is quickly transforming At Backbase we are powering this digital revolution As an Amsterdambased global software company we have made it our mission to be the preferred banking app for 10 of the worlds smartphone users We are here to make a positive impact on peoples daily lives by making finance easier, and to turn banking into valuable experiences Thats why we help banks across the globe become digitalfirst, create peoplecentric solutions and enable them to deliver superior digital experiences to their clients, With your data driven approach you create insights and track the revenue contribution and attribution of our campaigns You are a member of the digital marketing tribe and support our global and local online marketing campaigns Being part of an international marketing team, you will work closely with the field marketing managers, growth marketing manager, data analysts, and copy  design team to create impactful online campaigns, , , Were looking for an analytical and creative individual to experiment, iterate quickly and optimize continuously, , , , , , , , You experiment, analyze and continuously improve the impact of our Linkedin and Adwords campaigns You create compelling creative and landing pages to boost our PPC performance overall You support our marketing automation and email marketing initiatives By analyzing web behavior, you create better customer experiences on our website and improve the conversion on our pages You contribute to the overall measurability of marketing impact, track performance by channel and come up with suggestions for improvement, , In short, you enjoy switching from crunching numbers, coming up with innovative ideas to configuring campaign set up

Everyone Comfortable in Their Own Shoes, , Crocs, Inc NASDAQ CROX is a world leader in innovative casual footwear for men, women and children with more than 1 billion in annual revenue The company offers several distinct shoe collections with more than 300 fourseason footwear styles All Crocs shoes feature Croslite material, a proprietary, revolutionary technology that gives each pair of shoes the soft, comfortable, lightweight, nonmarking and odorresistant qualities that Crocs wearers know and love Crocs fans Get Crocs Inside every pair of shoes, from the iconic clog to new sneakers, sandals, boots and heels Since its inception in 2002, Crocs has sold more than 200 million pairs of shoes in more than 90 countries around the world, , Our European head office in is looking for an starting in February 2021, , , , The EMEA Social Media Intern will support the EMEA Social Media Team in implementing tactics which will drive community growth and brand loyalty through communicating brand and product initiatives and will serve as a communication point for the Crocs consumer base In addition, this intern will provide insight into Crocs online communities to key departments within the Crocs corporate infrastructure  such as Marketing, Ecommerce, Sales, Product Development and Customer Service This position requires excellent communication and writing skills, marketing savvy, tenacity, computer skills and knowledge of social media and social networking sites, tools and applications You will report directly to the EMEA Innovation Marketing Manager, , , , or similar, youve got our full attention, , Finally, do you have a passion for content and a great visual eye Do you have excellent verbal and written communication skills in English Wed love to meet you, , , , , , , Is this the internship youre looking for Dont hesitate to apply We would like to speak with you

Fossil Free within one generation  we are looking for bright minds to make this happen, Are you passionate about brand marketing and do you like to work in an international organization Then this might be the right internship for you, , , As intern Brand Marketing you will support the Brand Team in activating the Vattenfall brand The team members are located in all Vattenfall core markets and have the task to develop and execute inspiring brand experiences You will be supporting the team based in the Netherlands, , You have the opportunity to be involved and experience projects from start to finish concept, production, delivery, evaluation You will support the Brand Managers in activating the brand in the Netherlands through all different activities such as social media activations, PR or events By supporting the Brand Managers, you will contribute to the operations of effective branded content On top of this, you will have the opportunity to lead sub projects, allowing you to differentiate yourself, , Being an intern at Vattenfall means more than getting involved in the daytoday running of the company As an intern, youll get exposure to real projects and challenges in a dynamic environment and gather valuable work experience We are looking for a motivated intern in the field of Brand Marketing for a period of 6 months, , , , , , , , , At Vattenfall you will gain experience in an open and entrepreneurial environment We offer you a challenging internship in an informal, dynamic organization You can play a part in shaping the future of a company where the only constant is change Besides being a challenging and inspiring place to work, we value a great work atmosphere We want to be the best in what we do The renumeration amounts to 500 euro per month, , , We are looking for someone who is available for a period of 6 months, for at least 4 days a week, We would like to receive your curriculum vitae and motivation letter we do not accept applications via email For questions regarding this internship please contact Olena Sorkina at olenasorkinavattenfallcom

Job Description: Business Development Manager  Digital Industry, Are you looking for the next step in your career Do you want to be part of the creation of a successful business in the digital industry space, , Todays industrial companies face numerous new challenges Rapid urbanisation and population growth are placing a strain on resources, environmental concerns are driving the need for greater sustainability, and digitisation is transforming wellestablished methodologies To meet these challenges headon, firms must adapt now or risk being left behind, At Royal HaskoningDHV Digital, we combine the latest digital technologies with over 140 years of engineering experience to help clients in various industry sectors like food  beverage and fast mover consumer goods to thrive in this new environment We can help you expand your capabilities, maximise productivity, gain new insights, and embrace the full potential of industry 40, From boosting capex returns to more efficiently managing assets and operations, our digital services and capabilities can help you prepare for the demands of tomorrows industry Using models, simulations, digital twins, and a methodology of continuous innovation, we can highlight the best ways to improve your assets, processes and systems, , , , The Dutch industry market is identified as one of the growth areas for Royal HaskoningDHV Digital To take this growth to the next level, we are looking for a Business Development Manager  Digital Industry, In this role, you will be responsible for the positioning of Royal HaskoningDHV Digital in the Dutch industry market You take the lead in the commercial process of acquiring new clients and extend our portfolio of existing Royal HaskoningDHV clients into the digital services space Initially you will primarily focus on the food  Beverage and Fastmoving consumer good segments, but this can be extended later on, , To do this successful you need to obtain and maintain long term client relationships with our key clients by understanding their business drivers Besides that, you will be advising our partners on how we add value to their business case And, you will focus on closing sales contracts based on your clientspecific strategy and experience, The ideal candidate will be apt and experienced in building strong relationships with strategic customers in The Netherlands You will be able to identify the business drivers and requirements to achieve mutual partnership and customer satisfaction Your goal is to contribute in sustaining and growing our business to achieve longterm embedded relationships with our clients as a trusted partner who shapes future investments, , You will be closely collaborating with the consultants and expertise of Royal HaskoningDHV Digital But also, you are part of our global Digital industry team, and where potentially contribute also to international growth, , , , , , , , , , , , You will work in a professional organization with appealing inter national projects and products You support these projects in a multidisciplinary environment with experts who are leaders in their field In addition, we offer good primary and secondary employment conditions as well as excellent opportunities for development in both width and depth For example, we offer an attractive bonus scheme, flexible working conditions and opportunities for international projects and travel opportunities There is also the possibility to qualify for talent programs at different levels, , Primary location is Amersfoort, The Netherlands, , , , For more information you can contact Bart Brink, Global Director Digital Twins  email protected , , Acquisition as a result of this vacancy is not appreciated

Atlassian is continuing to hire with all interviewing and onboarding done virtually due to COVID19 All new and existing Atlassians will continue to work from home until its safe to return to our offices When our offices reopen, every Atlassian will have the choice to work from an office or from home, , Were looking for our newest Atlassian who is driven to help develop Atlassians partner business in Northern Europe Have you worked with channel partners before and want to do it in at a hypergrowth company and in an nonsalesy business model The North EMEA region includes Nordics, Baltics, Benelux and UK  Ireland and is a strong established market with growth potential in all segments including enterprise Atlassians lowtouch model together with our existing channel partners has served us very well, but we also understand that at scale, doing business in this territory requires a stronger local presence To support the continued rapid growth we are growing the Northern EMEA channels team We are seeking a passionate channel specialist that can enable  support our channel partners, as well as assist with onboarding new partners into our flagship partner program The role requires someone who enjoys being challenged to tactically enable and develop our partners, , , , You have at least two years experience working in a channel support or management role You are business savvy, have good problem solving skills and strong attention to detail A strong teammate, you enjoy working with a wide variety of people and roles Youre able to prioritize multiple responsibilities, multitask and work independently, , Were looking for a fast learner with a desire to develop skills to tackle new tasks You have excellent communication skills, and are fluent in English, , Heres an idea of the kinds of things youll get to do, , , , , , , We are actively expanding the number of Channel Partners in the region You will work closely with the regional manager and the team of Channel Managers and Channel Specialists to enable and develop these new partners The team is part of a global organization that is tasked with building a channel that can deliver value to our customers The team works closely with the partner program, enablement and field marketing teams, to develop and deliver programs that suit the needs of our local partners, , The Global Channels team is part of the broader sales team, which has a very unique approach to selling A huge portion of our sales is done via credit card over the web through a selfservice, no negotiation, no discounting model That being said, we have great teams that work directly with customers of all sizes to ensure that they have the information they need to make a decision and be successful in the adoption of our products We believe in transparency and real teamwork, which reflects one of our five values, , , , Whether you work in an office or a distributed team, Atlassian is highly collaborative and yes, fun To support you at work and play we offer some fantastic perks ample time off to relax and recharge, flexible working options, five paid volunteer days a year for your favourite cause, an annual allowance to support your learning  growth, unique ShipIt days, a company paid trip after five years and lots more, , , , Creating software that empowers everyone from small startups to the whos who of tech is why were here We build tools like Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, and Trello to help teams across the world become more nimble, creative, and alignedcollaboration is the heart of every product we dream of at Atlassian From Amsterdam and Austin, to Sydney and San Francisco, were looking for people who want to write the future and who believe that we can accomplish so much more together than apart At Atlassian, were committed to an environment where everyone has the autonomy and freedom to thrive, as well as the support of likeminded colleagues who are motivated by a common goal to Unleash the potential of every team , , , , We believe that the unique contributions of all Atlassians is the driver of our success To make sure that our products and culture continue to incorporate everyones perspectives and experience we never discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, or marital, veteran, or disability status, , All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines, , Learn more about Atlassians culture, interviewing flow, and hiring process by checking out our Candidate Resource Hub

Job Title: Business Development Executive | SaaS MarTech | Building the French Market | Innovative eCommerce SaaS solution | Full-cycle SaaS selling
Job Description: Are you a sales professional, living in the Randstad, Are you fluent in French preferably mother tongue, Do you have a network in eCommerce in France, , , , , The company, founded in 2014 and based in the Netherlands is a fastgrowing SaaS MarTech scaleup Their product which is invented to boost online sales for eCommerce  retailers online is so stateofthe art, that they didnt have to do any acquisition so far Most of the clients came directly to them because of their awesome product They count well over a hundred employees now and they are aggressively growing in multiple European countries You can be part of this successstory, , , , As a BDE, you are a fullcycle solutions seller This means you need to be more than comfortable with approaching prospects in France Their targetprospects are ideally eCommerce companies MidSize to Enterpriselevel and Media Agencies for the indirect sales Having a large network in this branch is a very big plus After prospecting, your goal is to get in touch with the decision maker Typically, these are CMOs, Online Marketing Managers, Digital Directors, Head of Advertising, etc, Once you have their attention and you know their need, you will be responsible for conducting a product demonstration The sales cycle is short, three to six weeks After the demo, your role also entails negotiating and closing the deal You have to understand that this company is growing and that you are part of a growing sales team This means multiple career opportunities lie ahead and your performance is key in creating your own success

GenScript Biotech CorporationStock Code 1548HK is a global biotechnology group GenScripts businesses encompass four major categories based on its leading gene synthesis technology, including operation as a Life Science CRO, enzyme and synthetic biology products, biologics development and manufacturing, as well as cell therapy GeneScript has a global market share of 30 in synthetic biology, making it the biggest company in the industry, , Founded in 2002 and listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange in 2015, GenScript has an established global presence across Greater China, North America, the EU, and the Asia Pacific Today, over 300,000 customers from over 160 countries and regions around the world have used GenScripts premier, convenient, and reliable products and services, , GenScript BV is the European headquarters of GenScript Biotech Currently, we are looking to hire a Marketing Manager to be responsible for the marketing activities for the European market through a number of marketing channels including but not limited to conferences, exhibitions, roadshows, seminars, webinars and more The candidate should have a successful track record of exhibitions and conferences as a sponsor in a scientific environment fostering a valuable partnership with sales and helping them hit their quotas through custom and personalized field marketing strategies and tactics The candidate should have an extensive experience in digital marketing strategies as well, , The position reports to the Director of Marketing in GenScript BV

About Us, , Quorn Foods, with our entrepreneurial spirit is a great place to work Our people are passionate, take initiative and accountability and, most of all, work together as one team, focused on one shared goal with common values, , We are an ambitious, growing, independent FMCG company, focused on creating the worlds leading meatalternative business, through our market leading Quorn and Cauldron brands We are a global business that designs, manufactures and sells our healthy protein products globally with annual sales turnover in excess of 250 million across 17 territories, , Job title European Senior Brand Manager, , Reports to Head of Brand Marketing, , Responsible for No line management responsibility, , Key relationships UK based Brand Marketing, European Commercial, Category Analysis, Design to Print Manager, Packaging, Finance, Supply Chain, Advertising, PR and Media Agencies, , Purpose of role, , To plan, develop, execute and evaluate Quorn through the line marketing campaigns for the markets where we currently operate Netherlands, Belgium Sweden, Switzerland in line with the global creative idea, , To develop, plan and execute Quorn launch plans into European markets where we choose to operate in the future, , To support European markets in the development and delivery of their category vision

The position, , project44 is looking for a driven, data and resultsoriented Marketing Manager responsible to drive demand, create brand awareness and generate pipeline for specific Sales segments  from planning and execution of campaigns and programs, to analyzing results and measuring impact, , , , , , Familiarity with Salesforce, Eloqua, ABM Platforms, and other marketing technologies, , , , Since 2014, project44 has been transforming the way one of the largest, most important global industries does business As transportation and logistics continues to evolve and customer expectations around delivery become more demanding, industry technology must rise to the occasion In just a few short years, weve created a digital infrastructure that eliminates the inefficiencies caused by dated technology and manual processes Our Advanced Visibility Platform is used by the worlds leading brands to track shipments, collaborate with supply chain partners, drive operational efficiencies, and create outstanding customer experiences

Company Description, , Easygenerator empowers organizations to unlock and share their knowledge online We do this by simplifying and accelerating their learning development At Easygenerator, we offer educated validated learning tools combined with unparalleled personalized support, , We are growing approximately 100 per year It is our ambition to become the global category leader in authoring tools To realize our ambitious goals we are looking for a Performance Marketing Manager to join our marketing department, , , , You are a datadriven and creative Performance Marketing Manager with excellent analytical and communication skills You will be working together with our Head of Growth Marketing, Campaign Manager, SEO Manager and Copywriter to help bring the marketing of Easygenerator to the next level, , Setting up, monitoring, and optimizing paid media campaigns and running various experiments is what you are all about You will be responsible for customer acquisition through various digital channels, such as Google Adwords, Display, LinkedIn, and other paid media paid media channels and 3rd party platforms, , , , , Additional Information, , , , , , , Feel free to submit your application right away If you have any questions, you can ask Amelie email protected or send her a message on LinkedIn

Job Title: Marketing Manager, Expansion Markets at Sellpy
Job Description: Sellpy is the leading selling service and ecommerce for second hand goods in Sweden We offer our service in Sweden and Germany and due to our fast and solid growth, we are looking for a Marketing Manager for our new markets, , As Marketing Manager, Expansion Markets, you will play a key role in launching and building Sellpys brand in our newest markets starting with the Netherlands Your responsibilities include defining and executing local marketing activities to attract new buyers  sellers  from brand campaigns to influencer marketing and local partnerships We are a small team, so youll work hands on and it will be demanding and immensely rewarding at the same time, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , We can guarantee that you will be in for an exciting ride as you will be part of growing Sellpy in our new markets We hire people who thrive at a high workingpace in a constantly changing environment and who want to contribute to a more circular society, , , , , , Flexible but Netherlands is a plus, , Full time, , This autumn or as agreed upon

Invesco a great place to work and reflects the broad diversity of thought across our organisation At Invesco, we offer work experiences that will inspire and challenge you, , Your Team, , The Country Marketing organization works together with the other marketing teams most obviously DataInsights, Digital Experience, External Comms and Enablement to deliver to country needs and the overall EMEA marketing strategy, , Your Role, , As the Marketing Manager you will plan and execute multichannel campaigns targeted on the asset management markets in Benelux and Nordics Our challenge for the Marketing Manager in Benelux  Nordics is to initiate, deliver and measure distinctive and effective multichannel campaigns to develop deeper engagement between Invescos investment teams and prospects and clients regarding investment capabilities, strategies and solutions The role requires full ownership to go to market and provides a real opportunity to shine in a resultsoriented environment Location could be either Amsterdam or Stockholm, , You will be responsible for, , , , You will, , , , Please feel free to discuss flexible working options with us, , The Good Stuff, , Joining Invesco is just the start We focus on nurturing internal talent, offering a variety of tools to support your career advancement, including ongoing learning and development and internal career opportunities, , We have an outstanding benefits package, which includes, , , , Our Commitment to the Community, the Environment and Responsible Investing, We partner with charitable organisations globally to make an impact in the communities where we live and work Our people are encouraged to support the charities they feel most passionate about and are offered two days volunteering leave annually, We are committed to adopting and implementing responsible investment principles and practices that uphold our fiduciary responsibility to our clients, as well as being good stewards of the environment, , part of our commitment to deliver a superior investment experience, , Join Us, , Were driven by a passion to exceed Our people are our greatest asset and we take pride in supporting our colleagues Job Title: Marketing Manager - Office Homeoffice Remote Flexible
Location: RotterdamThe Hague metropolitan area, South Holland, Netherlands
Job Description: If you live and breathe marketing, we need to talk, , Were looking for a flexible and versatile marketer who will be responsible for the growth of our inbound sales channels, , Marketing manager responsibilities include tracking and analyzing the performance of advertising campaigns, managing the marketing budget and ensuring that all marketing material is in line with our brand identity, , To be successful in this role, you should have handson experience with web analytics tools and be able to turn creative ideas into effective advertising projects, , Ultimately, you will help us build and maintain a strong and consistent brand through a wide range of online and offline marketing channels, , , , Build strategic relationships and partner with key industry players, agencies and vendors, , Experiment with a variety of organic and paid acquisition channels, , Deploy successful marketing campaigns and own their implementation from ideation to execution, , Prepare and monitor the marketing budget on a quarterly and annual basis and allocate funds wisely, , Analyze consumer behavior and adjust email and advertising campaigns accordingly, , , , A sense of aesthetics and a love for great copy and witty communication, , Numerically literate, comfortable working with numbers, making sense of metrics and processing figures with spreadsheets, , Demonstrable experience in marketing together with the potential and attitude required to learn, , Uptodate with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement, , Proven experience in identifying target audiences and in creatively devising and leading across channels marketing campaigns that engage, educate and motivate

The Marketing  Communications Manager is responsible for the development, planning and execution of the local Marketing  Communication strategy Your main objective is to build greater knowledge and recognition of the TSystems brand externally and internally The local Marketing  Communication strategy is directly connected with the Global Marketing strategy and thats why you intensively collaborate with TSystems International on a daily basis You are the linking pin between Global Marketing, TSystems in the Netherlands and the local Marketing team, , You are proactive, innovative and bring creative solutions to questions from the business Furthermore stakeholder management comes naturally to you You advice and support stakeholders in the area of Marketing and Corporate Communications to ensure that all internal  external messages are aligned, , Job Responsibilities

About Us, , MessageBird is transforming the communications landscape as one of the fastestgrowing software companies in the world Our cloud communications platform makes it possible for businesses to instantly connect with over 7 billion phones globally, allowing them to speak with their customers in the same ways they talk to their friends, , Our suite provides access to all major messaging channels, from SMS and Voice to WeChat, Messenger, Facebook, WhatsApp and more We provide outofthebox solutions with our own applications like Inbox and Flow Builder, plus a robust set of APIs that simplify workflows and automation, , With over 20,000 customers  including some of the worlds biggest brands like Facebook, Deliveroo, Uber and WhatsApp  its likely that youve benefited from MessageBirds omnichannel technology at some point For small and midsized businesses, we also offer support and solutions through an Online SelfServe OSS dashboard, , Our global team is a powerhouse of 350 employees, who work across eight international offices We are excited that youre here and interested to, , How we work, , We work fast, grow fast, and build fast Life at MessageBird moves in fastforward motion Were a team that focuses on making an impact  right from day one We are gogetters, industry leaders, and dreamers Risk takers Rollupyoursleevesandmakeithappen kind of people We thrive on transparency, and we value solutionminded attitudes, , We are all driven by one ethos Get Shit Done We love shaping things together and leveraging different perspectives, because that makes our products better Our Birds are empowered with freedom and opportunity in return, we expect honesty, courage, and agility We own our work, and sometimes we fail And then we get back up and cross the finish line  together as a team Sound refreshing We think so, too, , The Role Head of Performance Marketing, , You will take full responsibility for charting a strategy, building processes and maintaining reporting of all performance channels that drive user action Managing a team of Performance Marketing Managers who ensure the acceleration of our growth through marketing acquisition as well as defining and executing the team strategy You maintain a continuous focus on ROI while experimenting with new channels, campaigns and technology, , What youll do, , , , What youll bring, , , , Psst  some added perks, , , , If you think youre a match for this role and can bring some great skills to the MessageBird team, please apply Were excited to get to know you, , Read MessageBirds Recruitment Privacy Statement

The future of work demands two major workforce changes from organisations  upskilling current staff so they may gain new skills in their current role, and reskilling staff to help them develop new capabilities and take on entirely new roles The current COVID19 sanitary crisis and all the uncertainty it has caused only expedites the need for companies to reskill and upskill their workers, so they may have a chance of bridging the skills gap and remaining competitive

Company Description, , Bynder is awardwinning marketing software that allows brands to easily create, find and use content, such as documents, graphics and videos More than 150,000 brand managers, marketers and creatives use Bynders brand portals every day to collaborate globally, produce, review and approve new marketing collateral, and circulate company content at the click of a button Brands using Bynder go to market faster and achieve endtoend brand consistency across all channels and regions, with simplified collaboration across the organization, , Founded in 2013 by CEO Chris Hall, Bynder is established globally with headquarters in Amsterdam and offices across the Netherlands, UK, US, Spain and UAE, , , , A  is responsible for the timely and complete implementation of Bynder for our customers, ,  Our customers all use the same Bynder DAM but we configure and implement accounts based on the specific needs and processes of each individual customer In order to do so we have to really understand the challenges our customers deal with on a daily basis, , , so its up to you to make sure they are happy with our services Your goal is to set our customers up for success and make them longtime Bynder advocates, ,  You take the customer by the hand and guide them through the entire implementation process You consult the customer on best possible solutions You are able to translate technical configurations into simple solutions, and vice versa You are a star in managing customers expectations and working with deadlines You have a strong helicopter view with regards to your projects and will not lose your eye for detail Lastly, we also depend on your input for our roadmap, helping us to shape the future of Bynder, , , Qualifications, , , , , Additional Information

What Youll Do, , At TradeTracker Netherlands, based in Almere, we are looking for a unique talent to hold the position of Head of Industry As Head of Industry your main focus is to provide superior client service, lead a team of Account Managers and support them to offer the best affiliate marketing service You will execute overall management of the client relationship on larger accounts and advise them on long term strategy and recommendations to ensure the clients marketing needs are met Additionally you will add value for new business development by growing business for existing clients and preparing and monitoring proposals for new clients, , , , , , , In addition, as a team leader and strategist, the Head of Industry must be able to understand clients needs, identify common goals and support the team in the same activities Holder of the role should possess strong general business skills, the ability to write and speak effectively, demonstrated leadership experience, a capacity for statistical analysis and developed organizational skills, , , , Upon joining, you will be rewarded with, , , , , TradeTracker is internationally present, and as members of the online community, we know better than anyone the internets ability to make national borders irrelevant, , Our global office presence helps us remain approachable and relevant to individual national markets, while also opening a network of potential international partners, , An ambition to grow has led to our presence in over 19 different countries, while we continually make plans for our next big venture
