Job Title: Associate Sales Development Representative, Netherlands (Swedish speaking)
Job Description: Job Description, , This role is based in Amsterdam, , Not just a job, are you looking for a sales career This is your chance to build a successful career with Nutanix, , Join our elite talent team, providing you solid ground for mentoring and developing your sales career, , Since the inception of our Inside Sales team in EMEA over the last five years, we were able to develop and promote a number of talents from joining our inside sales team to territory account managers and Global account managers across the field, , We are searching for a hungry, honest and humble Graduate Sales Development Representative SDR to drive our technology and superserve our customers, , , , Nutanix EMEA Inside Sales team is responsible for accelerating revenue growth This team is exposed to supporting functions like sales, marketing, channel and support within the organization as well as Nutanix customers, partners, distributors and alliances This team of 100 individuals is spread over the different hubs in EMEA, and consist of Sales Development Representatives, Inside Account Executives and Inside Channel Account Managers The teams unique vibe comes from the constant creativity, innovation and focus on how we can better serve our customers every time The EMEA Inside Sales team is a talent pool for other functions in the company, it is the ideal opportunity to get to know the Nutanix portfolio and accelerate your career, , , , , , , Does this sound like you Lets talk, , , , Founded in 2009 and headquartered in San Jose, California, Nutanix is a passionate team of 6000 employees worldwide Our people we call ourselves Nutants are the heartbeat of LifeAtNutanix and one of the many things that makes Nutanix a great place to work at We share an intellectual curiosity, a bias for action, and an obsession for our customers We are builders and problem solvers with an entrepreneurial spirit Above all, we celebrate what makes each of us unique, , We are humbled to be recognized as one of Bloombergs Top 50 Companies to Watch in 2020 and one of the Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work For 2020 , , Were growing fast and disrupting the computing industry Join us and make your mark, , , , Nutanix is a global leader in cloud software and a pioneer in hyperconverged infrastructure solutions, making computing invisible anywhere Companies around the world use Nutanix software to leverage a single platform to manage any app, at any location, at any scale for their private, hybrid and multicloud environments, , , , Nutanix is an Equal Employment Opportunity and in the US an Affirmative Action employer Qualified applicants are considered for employment opportunities without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, disability status or any other category protected by applicable law We hire and promote individuals solely on the basis of qualifications for the job to be filled, , We strive to foster an inclusive working environment that enables all our Nutants to be themselves and to do great work in a safe and welcoming environment, free of unlawful discrimination, intimidation or harassment, , As part of this commitment, we will ensure that persons with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodations If you need a reasonable accommodation, please let us know by contacting hrnutanixcom

About The Job, , The world around us has changed Now its time for commercial insurance to change as well Insify is born out of our frustration as entrepreneurs with traditional SME insurance Entrepreneurs are pursuing their ideas, their passion and their dreams They are taking risks on a daily basis Insify is there to support them, making sure entrepreneurs are getting covered and saving time for what they do best running and growing their business, , Be part of the team thats creating the first pan European InsurTech focused on SME insurance Work in a technology driven, legacy free environment, where we develop cutting edge insurance solutions for SMEs, , As our Growth Marketer you will be the driving force behind all our digital marketing campaigns and you make sure that were able to measure the success of these campaigns Youll be setting up our very first performancebased campaigns eg Google Ads and Social Media ads You will also oversee the acquisition and conversion part of our funnel, by running regular AB testing youll make sure that we improve on a daily basis, , , , , , , Youll have the unique opportunity to join an ambitious startup at an early stage, giving you plenty of opportunity to make real impact and gain valuable experience along the way Were recruiting for a in our office
